title: Nike's Stock Plunge, Kim K, and Pickleball
itunes:title: Nike's Stock Plunge, Kim K, and Pickleball
description:
Hosts Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower are joined by Bloomberg Editorial's Kim Bhasin to discuss Nike's dramatic stock plunge plus Kim Kardashian pays a hefty fine to the SEC for touting crypto, and what is pickleball? 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
